properties.areaDesc: South Laramie Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 2 at 2:43AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
Travelers along Interstate 80 and Happy Jack Road between Cheyenne
and Laramie today can expect west to west-northwesterly winds
between 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph between the hours of
11 AM MST and 5 PM MST today. Be prepared for sudden wind gusts
that could blow your vehicle off the road. Keep a firm grip on
your steering wheel and slow down when encountering these gusts.

Recent snowfall will be blown by these winds creating areas of
reduced visibility and slick to snow-covered roadways. Be prepared
to drive at slower speeds and increased vehicle spacing.

NWSheadline: GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE TODAY ACROSS INTERSTATE 80 BETWEEN CHEYENNE AND LARAMIE FROM 11 AM MST THROUGH 5 PM MST TODAY
